input.sentences: people were having to walk their bikes at certain parts of the race .
some people even had to carry their bikes .
the finish was near though as people started to draw close .
output.sentences: My dad was in a bike race today so we went to cheer him on.
At certain points the participants had to carry their bikes.
They even ran up hills carrying them.
It was good to see some female cyclists  joining in too.
We waited at the end to cheer as my dad crossed the finishing line.
